textos_fuente.text: Pro Shop  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Avila Golf and Country Club’s full-service Pro Shop offers the latest in golf fashion, state-of-the-art golf equipment and supplies. Men’s Golf Shirts & Apparel Avila Golf Shop carries a large variety of fancy and solid shirts including fabrics of comfort and style specifically designed for Florida weather. We carry the best that the golf industry offers such as Greg Norman, Adidas, Under Armour, Nike, Southern Tide and Fairway & Greene, among others. Visit our golf shop and receive outstanding customer service, competitive pricing and reliability. Ladies Shirts & Apparel Avila offers quality and contemporary fashions for women from Under Armour, Annika, Polo, and Adidas, and many more. Equipment Visit our shop to view and test equipment by Titleist, Callaway, Cleveland, Scotty Cameron, Oddysey, Taylor Made, US Kids and Ping. Consult with one of our knowledgeable professional staff members for your specific needs or discuss the latest equipment available. Remember we can match or beat any retail store pricing on golf equipment. Corporate Amenities Customize your next corporate merchandise order or golf tournament gifts by placing your logo or the Avila logo on any merchandise. Contact our Pro Shop for additional ordering information and competitive pricing. Head Golf Professional Chris Slattery 813.961.1754 cslattery@avilagolf.com Hours of Operation 7:30 a.m.-6:00 p.m. Tues.-Fri. 7:00 a.m.-5:30 p.m. Sat.-Sun. Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Dining  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Avila Golf and Country Club proudly offers its members and their guests exceptional food and beverage. Avila’s culinary team executes a commitment to provide extraordinary cuisine. The fare is traditional with an emphasis on finest quality and local exceptional products. The wine list features selections with superb representations of major varietals from vineyards around the world. From casual poolside dining to white tablecloth candlelight service, Avila does it all! Families celebrate all occasions, while children most enjoy the lavish Easter Celebrations, Breakfast with Santa, and Avila’s annual Spooktacular. Our creative culinary team is available to assist you in planning every facet of your special event. Southern hospitality is evident at Avila and is consistent upon every visit with cordial staff attending to your every need or special guest. Food and Beverage Director Zach Klempner zklempner@avilagolf.com Dining Venues Menus Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Teams and Leagues  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Tennis leagues and ladders are available for men and women of all skill levels year round. There are numerous options to participate on the Avila traveling team that plays other tennis clubs in the area. The Tennis Pavilion regularly hosts both doubles and singles leagues for members and their guests. Members can drop by the Tennis Pavilion and talk with our tennis staff to find a league that fits their level of competition. Tennis Leagues Women USTA 3.0 Level Tuesday Evening Women USTA 2.5 Level Friday Mornings Interbay Wednesday Mornings Women USTA 3.5 Level & USTA Combo 7.5 Level Thursday Mornings Men USTA 7.5 & 8.5 Level Saturday Mornings 20 Point Singles Ladder Men & Women Division Director of Tennis Roger Cypriano 813.968.6792 tennis@avilagolf.com < Hours of Operation Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m.-1:00 p.m. & 3:00-8:00 p.m. Saturday-Sunday 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. Amenities Teams & Leagues Junior Programs Events Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Avila Golf & Country Club Homes for Sale in Avila Tampa Florida Home Property Search Luxury Condos Luxury Homes New Developments About Contact Miami Communities / Tampa / Avila The luxury, gated community of Avila is located on the border of Tampa and Lutz. One of its biggest draws is the world-class Avila Golf and Country Club , home to the  Jack Nicklaus designed 18-hole golf course. The Club also includes state-of-the-art tennis courts, fitness center, pool pavilion, fine dining and a variety of social activities throughout the year. This has created an incredibly tight-knit community that at one point included Yankees superstar Derek Jeter! Avila homes for sale also boasts a high level of privacy and unparalleled security, with most of the security guards having a background in military or law enforcement. Interested in Selling your Avila Property? We are Florida's leading home and condo sales experts. We will sell your Avila property fast! With the expertise and proven track record, we market and
                            sell properties quickly, and for top dollar! Contact me at: 813-253-0643 or Click Here to get a FREE property market analysis Homes For Sale 3 Address Price Bed/Baths Interior Space $sf/$m² WF/Pool MLS Number 1203 PARRILLA DE AVILA $2,250,000 4 / 4 4,891sf  / 454m² $460 / $4,952m² N / Y TB8368392 Address Price Bed/Baths Interior Space $sf/$m² WF/Pool MLS Number 16502 MILLAN DE AVILA $2,795,000 5 / 5 6,182sf  / 574m² $452 / $4,867m² N / Y TB8391527 Address Price Bed/Baths Interior Space $sf/$m² WF/Pool MLS Number 704 BERROCALES DE AVILA $2,895,000 6 / 5 6,459sf  / 600m² $448 / $4,825m² N / Y TB8389783 Location Area: Tampa Price Range: $2,250,000-$2,895,000 Status: Year Built: Re-Sales Sale 3 Average Listing Price $2,646,666

Golf  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Bob Sierra’s vision combined with the design talents of Jack Nicklaus created 18-holes of incomparable championship golf. The par 71 course, plays 6,926 yards from the back tees and offers five sets of tees that cater to all levels of play. Intricately crafted, the Jack Nicklaus Signature Course provides a magnificent walk through the state-of-the-art Celebration turf fairways and Champion turf greens to the mansion-style Clubhouse that depicts the upscale and classic style of Florida and Avila’s old world charm. Members enjoy the benefits of PGA professionals on staff for private lessons and clinics, a full service pro shop, and state of the art practice facility complete with a separate wedge range and chipping green. Avila also offers the convenience that no advance tee time reservations are required. Head Golf Professional Chris Slattery 813.961.1754 cslattery@avilagolf.com Hours of Operation 7:30 a.m.-6:00 p.m. Tues.-Fri. 7:00 a.m.-5:30 p.m. Sat.-Sun. Fitness  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Avila Golf & Country Club’s state-of-the-art Fitness Center boasts modern equipment and programs for all ages and fitness levels. Avila Golf & Country Club’s 7,000 square foot Fitness Facility offers breathtaking views overlooking the golf course through the floor to ceiling windows. Watch an entertaining Netflix, surf the net, or escape to your favorite destination with a virtual coach motivating you every step of the way from the cutting-edge, user-friendly cardio equipment. Avila’s full-service wellness facility makes it easy to enjoy a healthy lifestyle, featuring rejuvenating Spa Treatment Rooms, a Pilates Reformer Studio, Fit Fuel Refreshment Bar and Group Fitness Studio, hosting   a variety of on-site and virtual wellness classes. We offer customized select services including Sports Specific, Tennis, Titleist Performance Institute Golf Fitness, Massage Therapy, Acupuncture and Personal Lifestyle Coaching for your total wellbeing.  Our certified health fitness specialists are committed to offering expert guidance in each individual member’s personal quest for optimal health and wellness . Fitness Agreement and COVID-19 Waiver 2023 Par-Q+ Youth Waiver — Fitness Center Manager Cathi Keefe 813.264.8106 ckeefe@avilagolf.com Hours of Operation Monday-Thursday: 6:00 a.m.-8:00 p.m. Friday: 6:00 a.m.-6:00 p.m. Saturday: 7:00 a.m.-6:00 p.m. Sunday: 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Lic #MM5214 Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Catering & Events  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment At Avila Golf and Country Club, quality and taste are our passion! Our food reflects our commitment to exceptional quality. With every bite just as delicious as the next, our menu is indeed a feast for the eyes! Avila’s Catering Portfolio highlights some of our specialties; however, we are happy to create custom catering menus for your special occasion. Whether you are planning a business meeting, intimate dinner, bridal shower, or birthday party, Avila’s private event rooms will inspire an event that is memorable and caters to your group’s specific needs and our event experts will help you to decide the perfect menu for your extraordinary event. Careful planning and top-notch service are critical to the success of any event. And our team of experts delivers in this respect, providing personal attention to every aspect, from planning and logistics to catering and banquets to audio-visual services, special events, and more. Call us today to schedule an event planning consultation. Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Charity Events  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Avila takes pride working with local charities through member sponsorship to benefit Tampa Bay charitable organizations. Avila has a long-standing history of charitable and community support. We host a select number of member sponsored golf outings, tennis tournaments and other events, all benefiting the Tampa Bay area. Events may be booked on Mondays and other select dates throughout the year. Many organizations have hosted fundraising events at Avila including Derek Jeter’s Celebrity Golf Tournament, Hemophilia Foundation of Tampa, Hillsborough Education Foundation, and more. Let our team put their experience to work for you. Avila’s elegant Clubhouse provides first-class amenities and is the perfect setting for your next event. Our dedicated team will assist you in creating the perfect menu to complement your golf or tennis tournament, live or silent auction, celebrity event or other charitable function. Our PGA professionals will orchestrate your golf tournament and coordinate tournament logistics. From guest arrival to customized scorecards, event scoring and awards presentations, we are confident your event will flow seamlessly. Contact us today to start planning your event! Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Weddings  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Avila Golf & Country Club is one of America’s most exclusive and beautiful country clubs. It is a magical experience as you enter the 26,000 square foot Clubhouse where you are greeted by elegant French doors that open to a breathtaking Atrium with 30-foot ceilings, vintage chandeliers and a magnificent grand piano. Avila provides the finest dining facilities for a wedding celebration or any other type of special event. The ambiance is warm and inviting, the service is personal and impeccable. We offer several menu packages to choose from or we can assist you in creating your own. Attending to your every detail are our special events and culinary teams. Partake in a lavish gala, elegant sit-down dinner, heavy hors d’oeuvres and cocktail reception or bountiful buffet. Our Main Dining Room can accommodate up to 200 guests for seated events and up to 300 guests for stand-up receptions. Our wood floored Atrium can be used as an intimate space for a ceremony or as an elegant dance floor where you and your guests will enjoy dancing to your favorite music under our stunning Atrium chandelier. Avila’s cordial staff will attend to your every need and detail to ensure your special event is the most impressive and unforgettable event imaginable. For additional information, please contact Kelly Lawson at (813) 963-3537. Wedding Brochure Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Special Events  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment The ambiance is old world elegance with personal and impeccable service. Avila provides the finest dining facilities for a wedding or special event. Celebrate at Avila by choosing from five Clubhouse private dining rooms and Terrace or a venue of your choice. Partake in a lavish gala, intimate dinner, hors d’ oeuvres and cocktail reception or bountiful buffet. Attending to your every detail is our team of special events and culinary professionals. Avila dining rooms can accommodate up to 200 guests for a seated event and 300 guests for stand up receptions. Private meeting rooms can accommodate 10 to 50 guests for seated events. Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment

Lessons  |  Avila Golf and Country Club Navigation Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Golf Pro Shop Golf Lessons Golf Outings Scorecard Recreation Tennis Amenities Teams and Leagues Junior Programs Events Health & Wellness Classes Personal Training Massage & Spa Services Aquatics Junior & Family Programs Membership Membership Options Request Information Dining Dining Venues Menus Special Events Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery About Map & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment Enjoy one of Florida’s best practice ranges and short game areas. Accomplished PGA members and apprentices are on hand to teach beginners, intermediate and advanced players all aspects of the game. Avila’s Golf Instructional Team: Director of Instruction: Scott Wickham Head Golf Professional: Chris Slattery Assistant Golf Professionals: Randy Rover, Mike Gareau, Michael Merrigan, and Garrett Brewer Lesson and Player Development Programs are now available with Scott Wickham. Scott’s lesson fee includes a full assessment of your game and a plan moving forward. Avila’s team provides quality programs for every segment of golfer, from personalized coaching programs, long-term player development programs for all ages and abilities, supervised practice sessions, group training and more. Programs focus on all areas of the game: Full Swing, Chipping, Pitching, Putting, Bunker Play, Etiquette, Rules of Golf, and Equipment Fittings. To schedule an appointment, please contact the Golf Pro Shop at 813.961.1754 or email Scott Wickham at swickham@avilagolf.com.
